content.rendered:
Client

The National Veterans Legal Services Program (NVLSP) is a non-profit organization working on behalf of veterans and active duty military personnel to ensure that they receive the benefits that they are entitled to having become disabled while performing military service for our country.

Objective

NVLSP was looking to develop web and mobile apps that would help veterans and active duty personnel determine the disability benefits they are eligible for.

Solution

Achievion team designed and delivered a turn key solution that consists of the following modules:

  • Web and mobile apps to allow veterans go through the multi-step questionnaire and determine the list of eligible benefits
  • Admin web app to allow NVLSP personnel configure the questionnaire wizard and track user activity

The platform supports both English and Spanish user interfaces to provide great user experience to all veteran categories.

Result

The multi-platform solution helped NVLSP to make it easier for their potential clients to find out about their disability benefits and connect with the organization for assistance in obtaining government’s help.

excerpt.rendered: Web and mobile apps to help veterans determine disability benefits eligibility.
